title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7004.7 - Inmate retention of correspondence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7004.7 - Inmate retention of correspondence

State Regulations

Any and all correspondence delivered to the inmate may be
retained by the inmate in his or her housing unit, subject to the provisions of
section
7075.5
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7004.7

Adopted

New

York State Register June 5, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 22, eff. 6/5/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
